launcher.title: Welcome to BlocklyCraft
launcher.subtitle: Select the deployment servers you want to start
launcher.description: Choose which server types you'd like to use for deploying your mods. You can start multiple servers or skip this step for local-only development.
launcher.fabricDescription: Modern mod loader for Java Edition
launcher.localModeDescription: Skip server setup and work locally
launcher.selectServerWarning: Please select at least one server or enable Local Mode

apiKeys.title: OpenAI API Keys
apiKeys.description: Enter your OpenAI API keys to enable AI features like block display generation and custom item textures.

platform.title: Platform Settings
platform.description: Configure the Minecraft platform and version you're developing for. This determines which blocks are available and how code is generated.

servers.title: Deployment Servers
servers.description: Manage which deployment servers are running. These servers are used to deploy your mods to Minecraft.

language.title: Language
language.description: Select your preferred language for the user interface and Blockly blocks.
language.label: Interface Language

newProject.title: New Project
newProject.message: Are you sure you want to create a new project? Unsaved changes will be lost.

deleteTexture.title: Delete Texture
deleteTexture.message: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.

deleteProject.title: Delete Project
deleteProject.message: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"?
deleteProject.messageDeployed: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"? This project is currently deployed and will be undeployed. This action cannot be undone.

undeployMod.title: Undeploy Mod
undeployMod.message: Are you sure you want to undeploy "{name}"? This will remove it from Minecraft.

message.copyHint: Click the text above to select and copy

examples.title: Examples & Projects
examples.noProjects: No saved projects yet. Create something awesome and click "Save" in the header!
examples.noTextures: No textures uploaded yet. Drag and drop images above!
examples.uploadImagesHint: Click to select PNG, JPG, GIF files
examples.aiTexturePrompt: Describe the texture you want (e.g., 'A glowing purple sword with lightning')

messages.saveBeforeCompile: Please save your project with a proper name before compiling.
messages.saveBeforeDeploy: Please save your project with a proper name before deploying.
messages.buildSuccessMessage: Build successful! Use "Deploy Mod" to deploy to the server.
messages.enterTextureDescription: Please enter a description for the texture
messages.setAPIKeyFirst: Please set your OpenAI API key in Settings first
messages.warningUndeployFailed: Warning: Could not fully undeploy mod:
